metadata.title: Friday, 2nd November, 2012
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Labour and Social Security how much salary increment, in terms of percentage, was awarded to lecturers in public universities and to employees of the Tanzania-Zambia Railway Authority in 2012.
Minister of Agriculture and Livestock how many metric tonnes of the following crops the Food Reserve Agency will purchase in the 2011/2012 crop marketing season
parts: (d)    cassava. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure):  Committee of Supply. Heads 01/01, 02/01, 02/03, 02/04, 19/01, 03/01, 04/01, 04/02, 04/03, 04/04 and 04/05 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 01    -    Office of the President - State House Head 02    -    Office of the Vice President Head 19    -    Disaster Management and Mitigation Unit Head 03    -    National Assembly Head 04    -    Ministry of Gender and Child Development
